pages.name: The Grub
pages.text: A grub, used to feed O-Frogs to breed them.
The Grub item, dropped from a grub when killed.

pages.name: The Overworld Unicorn
pages.text: An Overworld Unicorn, crafted from an Overworld Unicorn Amulet.

pages.name: The Nether Unicorn
pages.text: A Nether Unicorn, crafted from a Nether Unicorn Amulet.

pages.name: The End Unicorn
pages.text: An End Unicorn, crafted from an End Unicorn Amulet.

pages.name: The Headless Horseman
pages.text: The Headless Horseman, occasionally found roaming the night on his steed.
